title: Ron in Medford
description:
The Milton's trip was going smoothly until Chris order a rotisserie chicken at lunch (00:00:10). After stealing the spotlight Monday, Mike decided to steal Chris' regular segment and brought a game (00:08:45). Fallout continues from Will Smith slapping Chris Rock at the Oscars as Jim Carrey and more weigh in (00:25:00). An investigation begins into the allegations against Christian Arcand from Ron in Medford (00:43:30). Displaced Bostonian on Twitter breaks news that Greg Bedard is going to afternoons at WEEI (01:04:30). Calls, Mayor Wu's North End battle & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
